title: Lightning Trap: Leina & Laika
synopsis: The fourth and final OVA of the Leina-centric Machine Robo: Revenge of Chronos spin-off/sequel. Instead of following the story of the previous Wolf Sword Legend continuity, Lightning Trap takes place in another universe.
characters: ['Stohl, Leina', 'Strange, Laika', 'Yoshida, Kyouko', 'Pilot Kotani', 'Ookawa', 'Co-Pilot Tamura', 'Murphy', 'Kojima, Nami', 'Zarik', 'Luna']
